      • Initialize

      • buildNetwork

        public BayesianNetwork buildNetwork(data.DataSet data,
                           java.lang.Integer laplaceCount)
        Builds a new Bayesian network given a dataset.
        Parameters:
        data - the data set used to construct the network
        laplaceCount - the Laplace count used when generating all parameters in the network
        Returns:
        a constructed Bayesian network

      • conditionalJointProbability

        public java.lang.Double conditionalJointProbability(pair.Pair<data.attribute.Attribute,java.lang.Integer> pair1,
                                           pair.Pair<data.attribute.Attribute,java.lang.Integer> pair2,
                                           java.lang.Integer classVal)
        Calculate the conditional joint probability of two values of two attributes conditioned on a specific value of the class attribute.

        This method calculates P(X1 = x1, X2 = x2 | Y = y) where X1 and X2 are two attributes, and Y is the class attribute.
        Parameters:
        pair1 - an Attribute, Integer pair referring to the pair (X1, x1)
        pair2 - an Attribute, Integer pair referring to the pair (X2, x2)
        classVal - the value of the class attribute, referring to y
        Returns:
        the value of the calculated probability

      • conditionalProbability

        public java.lang.Double conditionalProbability(pair.Pair<data.attribute.Attribute,java.lang.Integer> pair,
                                      java.lang.Integer classVal)
        Calculate the conditional probability of two values of two attributes conditioned on a specific value of the class attribute.

        This method calculates P(X = x | Y = y) where X is an attribute, and Y is the class attribute.
        Parameters:
        pair - an Attribute, Integer pair referring to the pair (X, x)
        classVal - the value of the class attribute, referring to y
        Returns:
        the value of the calculated probability

      • jointProbability

        public java.lang.Double jointProbability(pair.Pair<data.attribute.Attribute,java.lang.Integer> pair1,
                                pair.Pair<data.attribute.Attribute,java.lang.Integer> pair2,
                                java.lang.Integer classVal)
        Calculate the conditional joint probability of two values of two attributes conditioned on a specific value of the class attribute.

        This method calculates P(X1 = x1, X2 = x2 | Y = y) where X1 and X2 are two attributes, and Y is the class attribute.
        Parameters:
        pair1 - an Attribute, Integer pair referring to the pair (X1, x1)
        pair2 - an Attribute, Integer pair referring to the pair (X2, x2)
        classVal - the value of the class attribute, referring to y
        Returns:
        the value of the calculated probability

      • buildCPD

        public void buildCPD(BayesianNetwork net,
            data.DataSet data)
        Builds the conditional probability table for every node in the network.
        Parameters:
        net - a network whose structure has already been inferred and constructed
        data - the data set used for building each CPD tree
